sentences.en: Breakfast television arrived in British life precisely a decade ago.
sentences.cn: 准确地说，早间电视节目于10年前进入英国人的生活。

sentences.en: He was carrying on about some stupid television series.
sentences.cn: 他喋喋不休地说着某个无聊的电视连续剧。

sentences.en: In the evenings I like to relax and watch television.
sentences.cn: 晚上，我喜欢放松下来，看看电视。

sentences.en: Lucy turned on the television to watch the evening news.
sentences.cn: 露西打开电视收看晚间新闻。

sentences.en: Our lives are bounded by work, family and television.
sentences.cn: 我们的生活囿于工作、家庭和电视中。

sentences.en: Television broadcasters were warned to exercise caution over depicting scenes of violence.
sentences.cn: 电视台受到警告，要求对暴力场面的描绘采取谨慎态度。

sentences.en: Television cameras were invited in to film him at work.
sentences.cn: 电视台摄像师被请进来拍摄他工作的镜头。

sentences.en: Television censors are cutting out scenes which they claim may offend.
sentences.cn: 电视节目审查官正在剪掉他们称有可能会令人反感的一些镜头。

sentences.en: Television companies tend to censor bad language in feature films.
sentences.cn: 电视公司往往会在审查故事片时删去其中的粗话。

sentences.en: The minute that the war started, everybody was glued to the television.
sentences.cn: 战事一起，所有人都盯紧了电视报道。

sentences.en: The movie industry had chosen to ignore the encroaching competition of television.
sentences.cn: 电影业故意无视电视业的侵犯性竞争。

sentences.en: The newspapers and television can make or break you.
sentences.cn: 报纸和电视会使你成功，也会将你毁掉。

sentences.en: The soldiers commandeered vehicles in the capital and occupied the television station.
sentences.cn: 士兵们征用首都的车辆，并且占领了电视台。

sentences.en: The television producer today has to be part news person, part educator.
sentences.cn: 今天的电视制片人必须既是新闻人，又是教育者。

sentences.en: There were television crews and pressmen from all around the world.
sentences.cn: 来自世界各地的电视工作者和新闻记者齐聚一堂。

sentences.en: They have a television in every room.
sentences.cn: 他们每个房间都配有电视。

sentences.en: They might be wise to stop advertising on television.
sentences.cn: 他们不妨停止在电视上做广告，这样做可能是明智之举。

sentences.en: Troops are still in control of the television and radio tower.
sentences.cn: 军队仍然控制着电视和广播发射塔。
